subject: Playoff Games
Basketball
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: Serge Ibaka, who returned from what appeared to be a season-ending calf problem to help the Thunder get back into their Western Conference finals matchup against the Spurs, has demonstrated his determination before.
snippet: Serge Ibaka, who returned from what appeared to be a season-ending calf problem to help the Thunder get back into their Western Conference finals matchup against the Spurs, has demonstrated his determination before.
